description: Each separately identifiable quantity of the same material lot shall be presented as a material sublot. A material lot may be stored in separately identifiable quantities. All material sublots are part of the same material lot, so they have the material lot’s property values. A material sublot may be just a single item
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration − Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: This material sublot is part of the related object as the whole

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: The material lot property(s) of this material sublot.

contents.name: isAssembledFrom
contents.description: The material sublot occurrences that are constructed based on this material sublot. The material sublot properties map to a corresponding material lot property

contents.name: isAssembledFromLot
contents.description: The related object(s) makes up part of this material sublot as the whole.

contents.name: specifies
contents.description: The test specification(s) used to evaluate this testable object.

contents.name: description
contents.description: Additional information about the material definition

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: spatialDefinition
contents.description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

contents.name: storageLocation
contents.description: Identifies the storage location of the material sublot.

contents.name: storageLocationType
contents.description: Indicates whether the storage location attribute refers to anoperational location, equipmentor physical asset object, or contains a description of the storage location.
contents.comment: Mandatory where a storage location is specified

enumValues.name: operationalLocation
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute references an operational location

enumValues.name: equipment
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute references an equipment object

enumValues.name: physicalAsset
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute references a physical asset

enumValues.name: description
enumValues.comment: storage location attribute contains a description of the storage location, such as a street address

contents.name: assemblyType
contents.description: Defines the type of the assembly

enumValues.name: physical
enumValues.description: the components of the assembly are physically connected or in the same area

enumValues.name: logical
enumValues.description: the components of the assembly are not necessarily physically connected or in the same area

contents.name: assemblyRelationship
contents.description: Defines the type of the relationships

enumValues.name: permanent
enumValues.description: an assembly that is not intended to be split during the production process

enumValues.name: transient
enumValues.description: a temporary assembly using during production, such as a pallet of different materials or a batch kit

contents.name: status
contents.description: Status of the material sublot in manufacturing operations. Values defined by implementation

contents.name: disposition
contents.description: Planning and logistics disposition of a material sublot or assembly of material lots.

enumValues.name: planned
enumValues.description: a material sublot that does not yet physically exist, is assigned to an operations request (segment requirement) or work request (Part 4 object) or job order (Part 4 object)

enumValues.name: inProcess
enumValues.description: the material sublot is in the process of being worked on

enumValues.name: restricted
enumValues.description: a material sublot is not permitted for normal use due to a restriction condition

enumValues.name: unrestricted
enumValues.description: material sublot is permitted for normal use without restriction

enumValues.name: closed
enumValues.description: material sublot has been reconciled as completely consumed, sold or disposed of

contents.name: quantity
contents.description: The quantity of the material sublot.

contents.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity
